en.title: FE's Achievers Recognition Dinner a Sellout on 08th August 2009 ! (2)

meta.description:
FE's Achievers Recognition Dinner on the 8th August 2009 at PGRM, KL, was a SELLOUT event with 1,800 Leaders, Members, VIPs and invited guests. It was a GREAT SUCCESS with many attending from overseas, including contingents from Thailand, Indonesia, Philippines, India, etc. VIP guests include Prof Dr WD Astana, former Indonesian Minister of Human Rights, former Miss Malaysias, Maggie Loo ( Miss Malaysia World 1973, now Ambassador for FE's Hope For Children Charity), Dato Yasmin Yusuf ( Miss Malaysia Universe 1978), Lynette Ludi Mei Ling ( Miss Malaysia Universe 2000) , Sandie Lee ( Miss Malaysia Asia Pacific 2000), Kee Hua Chee ( Star Newspaper celebrity journalist ), Presidents from 6 Rotary Clubs, Steve Dear ( Founder of Asian Children's Foundation), YM Tunku Ellie Badariah ( Team Manager, Woman's Football Association Malaysia) , Dato Hoh Hee Lee ( Vice President, Malaysia Wheelchair Basketball Federation), Stella Ignacio ( Jazz Singer and Director, Philippines Center For Arts Foundation) , Jimmy Dee ( Broadway Singer and now FE Country Licensee for Guam and Hawaii).
Highlights of the Event include :
- Entertainment by Glitz Jazz Band.
- Marching in Procession of FE's Founder CEO Paul Ting, Founder Director KS Lee, VIPs, Country Licensees and Presidential Directors.
- Singing of FE's Quantum Science song on the stage.
- Opening Speech by FE Founder Director KS Lee.
- Performance by Jimmy Dee, Broadway singer.
- Performance by Stella Ignacio, jazz singer from Philippines Center For Arts Foundation.
- Performance by 9 year old singing sensation, Clark Gamul, from Philippines. Amazing ! Clark sang 2 Michael Jackson's songs "Ben" and "I'll Be There". You are a star, Clark !
- Performance by ventriloquist, Steve Dear, Founder of Asian Children's Foundation. The audience was captivated !
- Gift presentation to Prof Dr WD Astana, former Indonesian Minister of Human Rights, from FE Founder CEO Paul Ting.
- Speech by Maggie Loo, Ambassador of FE's " Hope For Children " Charity. FE targets to raise USD 10 Million over the next 5 years to help poor and needy children of this world.
- Launching of " Hope For Children " on the stage with Paul Ting, KS Lee, VIPs, Country Licensees and Presidential Directors.
- Clark and Stella lead the crowd singing "We Are The World" and theme song "Hope For Children". Another amazing and touching performance from Clark !
- Signing of Collaborating Partners between "Hope For Children" and 6 Rotary Clubs Presidents and 5 Children Charities with former Miss Malaysias, followed by mock cheque presentations.
- Donation of RM 80,000 ( Pesos 1 Million ) by FE's PD and Philippines Country Licensee Jeremy Looi to " Hope For Children ". Thank you,Jeremy for your kind heart and generosity and for taking the lead in this worthy cause !
- Mock Cheque presentation of Rm 20,000 ( cash and products) sponsorship for Women's Football Association Malaysia, represented by Team Manager YB Tunku Ellie Badariah and Head Coach Ms Zhang Hong.
- Mock Cheque presentation of Rm 20,000 ( cash and products) sponsorship for Malaysia Wheelchair Basketball Federation, represented by Vice President Dato Hoh Hee Lee.
- Gift Presentation from FE's India Leaders to Paul Ting and KS Lee. Thank you, PDs Dato Barani and Kanarukan Dorasammy and Team for a great job done in India !
- Presentation of Open University Malaysia Certificates for graduates at recent training seminar conducted by Dr BN Edward and Dr Mohd Fadil Samion.
- Installation of New Directors, Executive Directors and Presidential Directors. Congratulations to all !
- Speeches and Sharings by New Presidential Directors. Truly inspirational !
- Speeches and Sharings by PDs Dr Mohd Fadil Samion, Jankij, Rachel thomas and KC Phoon. To be successful all you need to do is to follow the success path of FE's successful leaders ! They can do it, You can do it !
- Lucky Draw 100 Quantum Waters.
A BIG THANK YOU to MCs Lovey Lee and Rod ( from Mix FM) for a great job done ! And to all, SEE YOU AT THE TOP! AHOO! AHOO! AHOO!!!
meta.author: klhunter

- Lucky Draw 100 Quantum Waters.
